alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 10:58AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Greenwood County through 1130 AM CDT... At 1058 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Eureka, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Greenwood County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
